name: Chaos Strike
description:
Let there be Chaos!

Chaos-Strike is a fast paced single-player game.

This game was made in the course of 4 days,  for the Gift-Jam 2021

Levels:

Chaos Strike has 6 levels in total.

Gradually introducing new mechanics and level elements.

Controls:
  • Pull the mouse to aim and slow down time.
  •  let go of the mouse to strike.
